channel.title: Macro Photography on CineReal.info
channel.description: Recent content in Macro Photography on CineReal.info

item.title: Macro Photography
item.description: Tested my old macro rings on the new camera. The snow was just melting and I tried to catch some melting snow droplets. The shot with the water droplets on top of the leaf was set up inside with distilled water.

item.title: Papiliorama
item.description: The perfect place to test your photography equipment. Don’t panic when the lens fogs up for the first few minutes, especially on a cold winter day. Just wait a bit and it’ll recover. Great playground to practice and improve your photography skills.
